title: another ghost game issue
body:
Fuck,  i got a half day from school and i come home super hyped to play league, i queue up a flex game with my friends and 5 minutes into the game, two of us d/c, me and my friends internet die, we reboot and reconnect and then they ended asap BUT IT DIDNT FOR US. Me and my friend still tryin to rc and one of us who didnt d/c is also having the problem

RITO PLS SEND HELP 
SAVE MY HALF DAY

replies.body: Hey, looking into this!  No info to offer right now, but you may have to wait for the server to get the message that your match is finished.  Hang tight!

Hey not sure if this helps, but anyway, After I skipped the stats, I went to my match history to see if it counted and it said I got a victory. I even clicked the match and it loaded all the post game stats, however it's still saying I'm in game (ghost game). So I'm not sure what the issue is, but at least some part of the server recognizes that the game ended.
